game_info.name: Pirateers v2
game_info.description: Top-down pirate action where player commands a ship, engages in broadside naval combat, collects loot, trades at ports, upgrades vessel. Day/night cycle with timed expeditions.

core_loop.description: Base Phase (prepare, trade, upgrade) -> Set Sail -> Day at Sea (combat, loot, explore) -> Return to Base (automatic at timer or manual) -> Repeat

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Position ship perpendicular to enemies, press Space to fire cannons from both sides. A/D to turn, W/S to change speed. Approach ports and press E to dock.
